name: Fake Nostalgia
description:
Our protagonist finds themself in a fake world that attempts to emulate the console he played as a child, the Tari 2700.

Exploit the actual limitations of the console and find out what's happening with this weird world.

Controls:

-Space: Jump and skip dialogue

-Arrow: Use powers and move around

-Shift: Shoot your projectile

(Just in case, consider that getting bullet power ups lets you destroye thicker doors)
